item.description:
A bit of a change of pace this month as we tackle The Dirt: Confessions of the World's Most Notorious Rock Band by Tommy Lee, Vince Neil, Mick Mars, and Nikki Six (collectively Mötley Crüe) and Neil Strauss.  

What?  Why are you looking at me like that?

Come on, even NPR says you should read this: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=122324697

I'm going to go out on a limb and say that no book club has ever made this selection, which makes us pretty bad ass.  Come to Life Alive on Tuesday May 3rd (we'll be downstairs) at 7 to discuss fame, the medium of the memoir, point of view, social mores, guilty pleasure reading, and, yes, sex, drugs, and rock and roll (well, sex, drugs, and hair metal).

Nick

http://www.amazon.com/Dirt-Confessions-Worlds-Most-Notorious/dp/0060392886

http://www.powells.com/biblio/1-9780060989156-0
item.name: Cambridge Readers: The Dirt by Mötley Crüe
